sequence_counts(location, cumulative, sub_admin)¶

outbreak_data.sequence_counts(location=None, cumulative=None, sub_admin=None, server='api.outbreak.info')¶

Returns number of sequences per day by location

Parameters:

  • location_id (str) – (Optional). A string. If not specified, the global total counts are returned.

  • cumulative (bool) – (Optional). If true returns the cumulative number of sequences till date.

  • subadmin (bool) – (Optional). If true and cumulative=true, returns the cumulative number of sequences for the immedaite lower admin level.

Returns:

A pandas DataFrame

global_prevalence(pango_lin, mutations, cumulative)
